name: The Arrow's Call
description:
This game was submitted for the JoJo Jam (March 2020). A 2D platformer game, following the steps of Jotaro (and his stand Star Platinum) who has been called to Italy by his good friend Polnareff (or Polnaturtle) after discovering an arrow, that could lead to disaster if it fell into the wrong hands. You must dodge the enemies and get through the levels in order to find this arrow. 

Known Issues:
- There is only one level at the moment
